Text: Aperture 3 was released today, just FYI

Aperture 3 was just released. It will take a few days before a serial is available. That was the story with Aperture 2. The trial is positively wonderful and I want to upgrade, so much so that if I can't do it for free I may actually become an honest man and spend the $200! The non-destructive brushes are amazing--no more having to export to a huge TIFF just to do some local sharpening!
